directions: Blend milk gradually into cream cheese with wire whisk in a bowl; whisk in lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and garlic salt. Stir shrimp through cheese mixture until evenly mixed.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap; refrigerate at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 (4.5 ounce) can tiny shrimp, rinsed and drained
title: Party Shrimp Dip
